juzs.text: 51|31|Ibarahima balalena, ‘he prerita pheresatagana! Tomadera bisesa kaja [1] ki?’
51|32|Tara balala, ‘niscaya amara eka aparadhi sampradayera prati prerita hayechi.
51|33|Yate tadera upara niksepa kari matira sakta dhela
51|34|ya simalanghanakaridera jan'ya cihnita apanara rabera kacha theke [1].’
51|35|Atahpara sekhane yesaba mumina chila amara taderake bera kare niye asalama.
51|36|Tabe amara sekhane ekati paribara chara ara kono musalima pa'ini.
51|37|Ara yara marmambhada sastike bhaya kare amara tadera jan'ya okhane ekati nidarsana rekhechi.
51|38|Ara nidarsana rekhechi musara brttante'o, yakhana amara take spasta pramanasaha phira’a'unera kache pathalama [1]
51|39|takhana se ksamatara ahankare mukha phiriye nila [1] ebam balala, ‘e byakti haya eka jadukara, na haya eka unmada.’
51|40|Kaje'i amara take o tara dalabalake sasti dilama ebam tadera sagare niksepa karalama, ara se chila tiraskrta.
51|41|Ara nidarsana rayeche ‘adera ghatanate'o, yakhana amara tadera birud'dhe prerana karechilama akalyanakara bayu [1]
51|42|eta ya kichura upara diye baye giyechila take'i yena parinata karala curna-bicurna dhbansastupe.
51|43|Ara'o nidarsana rayeche samudera brttante'o, yakhana taderake bala hayechila, ‘bhoga kare na'o ekati nidrsta kala.’
51|44|Atahpara tara tadera rabera adesa manate ahankara karala; phale taderake pakara'o karala bajra [1] ebam tara ta dekhachila.
51|45|Atahpara tara uthe damrate parala na ebam pratirodha karate'o parala na.
51|46|Ara (dhbansa karechilama) edera age nuhera sampradayake, niscaya tara chila phaseka sampradaya.
51|47|Ara asamana amara ta nirmana karechi amadera ksamata bale [1] ebam amara niscaya'i mahasamprasaranakari [2].
51|48|Ara yamina, amara take bichiye diyechi, atahpara kata sundara byabasthapanakari [1] (amara)
51|49|ara pratyeka bastu amara srsti karechi joraya joraya [1], yate tomara upadesa grahana kara.
51|50|Ata'eba, tomara allahara dike dhabita ha'o [1]. Niscaya ami tomadera prati allahara paksa theke eka spasta satarkakari [2].
51|51|Ara tomara allahara sathe kono ilah‌ sthira karo na; ami tomadera prati allaha prerita eka spasta satarkakari.
51|52|Ebhabe tadera purbabatidera kache yakhana'i kono rasula esechena tara'i take baleche, ’e to eka jadukara, na haya eka unmada!’
51|53|Tara ki eke aparake e mantrana'i diye eseche? Baram era simalajayanakari sampradaya [1].
51|54|Kaje'i apani taderake upeksa karuna, ete apani tiraskrta habena na.
51|55|Ara apani upadesa dite thakuna, karana niscaya upadesa muminadera upakare ase.
51|56|Ara ami srsti karechi jina ebam manusake ejan'ye'i ye, tara kebala amara ibadata karabe.
51|57|Ami tadera kacha theke kono riyika ca'i na ebam eta'o ca'i na ye, tara amake kha'oyabe [1].
51|58|Niscaya allaha, tini'i to riyikadata, prabala saktidhara, parakramasali.
51|59|Sutaram yara yuluma kareche tadera jan'ya rayeche tadera samamatabalambidera anurupa prapya (sasti). Kaje'i tara etara jan'ya amara kache yena tarahuro na kare [1].
51|60|Ata'eba, yara kuphari kareche tadera jan'ya durbhoga se dinera, ye dinera bisaye taderake satarka kara hayeche.
52|1|Sapatha tura parbatera [1]
52|2|sapatha kitabera, ya likhita ache [1]
52|3|unmukta pataya [1]
52|4|sapatha bayatula ma’murera [1]
52|5|sapatha samunnata chadera [1]
52|6|sapatha udbelita sagarera [1]
52|7|niscaya apanara rabera sasti abasyambhabi
52|8|etara nibaranakari ke'u ne'i [1].
52|9|Yedina asamana andolita habe prabalabhabe [1]
52|10|ara parbata paribhramana karabe druta [1]
52|11|ataheba durbhoga se dina mithyaropakaridera jan'ya.
52|12|Yara khelara chale asara kajakarme lipta thake [1]
52|13|yedina taderake dhakka marate marate niye ya'oya habe jahannamera agunera dike
52|14|‘eta'i se aguna yake tomara mithya mane karate.’
52|15|Eta ki tabe jadu? Na ki tomara dekhate paccha na [1]
52|16|tomara ete dagdha ha'o, atahpara tomara dhairya dharana kara athaba dhairya dharana na kara, ubhaya'i tomadera jan'ya samana. Tomara ya karate tara'i pratiphala tomaderake deya hacche.
52|17|Niscaya muttakira thakabe jannate o arama-ayese
52|18|tadera raba taderake ya diyechena tara ta upabhoga karabe ebam tadera raba taderake raksa karechena jalanta agunera sasti theke
52|19|‘Tomara ya karate tara pratiphala sbarupa tomara trptira sathe panahara karate thaka [1].’
52|20|Tara basabe srenibad'dhabhabe sajjita asane helana diye; ara amara tadera milana ghataba dagara cokhabisista hurera sange

52|21|ara yara imana ane, ara tadera santana-santati imane tadera anugami haya, amara tadera sathe milita karaba tadera santana-santatike [1] ebam tadera karmaphala amara ekatu'o kamabo na [2]; pryatyeka byakti nija krtakarmera jan'ya dayi [3].
52|22|Ara amara taderake bariye deba phalamula ebam gosata ya tara kamana karabe.
52|23|Sekhane tara parasparera madhye adana-pradana karate thakabe panapatra, sekhane thakabe na kono asara katha-barta, thakabe na kono papakaja'o [1].
52|24|Ara tadera sebaya carapase ghuraghuri karabe kisorera, tara yena suraksita mukta.
52|25|Ara tara eke an'yera dike phire jijnesa karabe
52|26|tara balabe, niscaya age amara paribara-parijanera madhye sankita abasthaya chilama [1].
52|27|Atahpara amadera prati allaha anugraha karechena ebam amaderake agunera sasti theke raksa karechena.
52|28|Niscaya amara age'o allahake dakatama, niscaya tini krpamaya, parama dayalu.
52|29|Ata'eba apani upadesa dite thakuna, karana, apanara rabera anugrahe apani ganaka nana, unmada'o nana.
52|30|Naki tara bale, ‘se ekajana kabi? Amara tara mrtyura pratiksa karachi.
52|31|Baluna, ‘tomara pratiksa kara, ami'o tomadera sathe pratiksakaridera antarbhukta [1].’
52|32|Naki tadera bibeka-bud'dhi taderake e adesa dicche, baram tara eka simalanghanakari sampradaya [1].
52|33|Naki tara bale, ‘e kura'ana se baniye baleche?’ Baram tara imana anabe na.
52|34|Ata'eba, tara yadi satyabadi haya tabe etara mata kono bani niye asuka na [1]
52|35|tara ki srasta chara srsti hayeche, na tara nijera'i srasta [1]
52|36|naki tara asamanasamuha o yamina srsti kareche? Baram tara drrha bisbasa kare na.
52|37|Apanara rabera guptabhandara ki tadera kache rayeche, naki tara e sabakichura niyanta
52|38|naki tadera kono simri ache yate arohana kare tara sune thake? Thakale tadera se srota suspasta pramana niye asuka
52|39|tabe ki kan'ya santana tamra jan'ya ebam putra santana tomadera jan'ya
52|40|tabe ki apani tadera kache parisramika cacchena ye, tara etake ekati durbaha bojha mane kare
52|41|naki gayebi bisaye tadera kono jnana ache ye, tara ta likhache
52|42|naki tara kono sarayantra karate caya? Pariname yara kuphari kare tara'i habe sarayantrera sikara [1].
52|43|Naki allaha chara odera an'ya kono ilaha ache? Tara ye sirka sthira kare allah‌ ta theke pabitra
52|44|ara tara akasera kono khanda bhenge parate dekhale balabe, ‘eta to eka punjibhuta megha.’
52|45|Ata'eba, taderake chere dina se dina paryanta, yedina tara bajraghate hatacetana habe.
52|46|Sedina tadera sarayantra kono kaje asabe na ebam taderake sahayya'o kara habe na.
52|47|Ara niscaya yara yuluma kareche tadera jan'ya rayeche echara aro sasti. Kintu tadera adhikansa'i ta jane na

52|48|ara apani dhairyadharana karuna apanara rabera sid'dhantera upara; niscaya apani amadera caksura samane'i rayechena [1]. Apani apanara rabera saprasansa pabitrata o mahima ghosana karuna yakhana apani dandayamana hana [2]
52|49|ara tamra pabitrata ghosana karuna ratera bela [1] o tarakara asta gamanera para [2].
53|1|Sapatha naksatrera, yakhana ta haya astamita [1]
53|2|tomadera sangi [1] bibhranta naya, bipathagami'o naya
53|3|ara tini managara katha balena na [1].
53|4|Tato kebala ohi, ya tara prati ohirupe prerita haya
53|5|take siksa dana karechena pracanda saktisali [1]
53|6|saundaryapurna satta [1]. Atahpara tini sthira hayechilena [2]
53|7|ara tini chilena urdhbadigante [1]
53|8|tarapara tini tara kachakachi halena, atahpara khuba kachakachi
53|9|Phale tadera madhye du dhanukera byabadhana ra'ila athaba tara'o kama [1].
53|10|Takhana allah‌ tamra bandara prati ya ohi karara ta ohi karalena [1]
53|11|ya tini dekhechena, tara antahkarana ta mithya baleni [1]
53|12|tini ya dekhechena tomara ki se bisaye tamra sange bitarka karabe
53|13|ara abasya'i tini take arekabara dekhechilena
53|14|‘sidaratula muntaha’ tatha prantabarti kula gacha era kache [1]
53|15|yara kache jannatula ma’oya [1] abasthita.
53|16|Yakhana kula gachatike ya acchadita karara ta acchadita karechila [1]
53|17|tara drsti bibhrama hayani, drsti laksyacyuta'o hayani [1].
53|18|Abasya'i tini tara rabera mahana nidarsanabalira kichu dekhechilena
53|19|ata'eba, tomara amake jana'o ‘lata’ o ‘uyaya' samparke
53|20|ebam trtiya arekati ‘manata’ samparke [1]
53|21|tabe ki tomadera jan'ya putra santana ebam allahara jan'ya kan'ya santana
53|22|e rakama bantana to asangata [1].

53|23|Egulo kichu nama matra ya tomara o tomadera purbapurusara rekhecha, yara samarthane allah‌ kono dalilapramana nayila karenani. Tara to anumana ebam nijedera prabrttira'i anusarana kare, athaca tadera kache tadera rabera paksa theke hedayata eseche [1].
53|24|Manusa ya caya ta'i ki se paya
53|25|bastutah akherata o duniya allah‌ra'i
53|26|ara asamanasamuhe bahu phirisata rayeche; tadera suparisa kichumatra phalaprasu habe na, tabe allahara anumatira para, yara jan'ya tini icche karena o yara prati tini santusta.
53|27|Niscaya yara akhiratera upara imana ane na tara'i naribacaka nama diye thake phirisataderake [1]
53|28|athaca e bisaye tadera kono jnana'i ne'i, tara to sudhu anumanera'i anusarana kare; ara niscaya anumana satyera mokabilaya kona'i kaje ase na [1].
53|29|Ata'eba, apani take upeksa kare caluna ye amadera smarana [1] theke bimukha haya ebam kebala duniyara jibana'i kamana kare.
53|30|Eta'i tadera jnanera sesa sima. Niscaya apanara raba, tini'i bhala janena ke tamra patha theke bicyuta hayeche ebam tini'i bhala janena ke hedayatapraapta hayeche.

53|31|Ara asamanasamuhe ya kichu ache o yamine ya kichu ache ta allah‌ra'i. Yate tini tadera kajera pratiphala dite parena yara manda kaja kare ebam taderake tini uttama puraskara dite parena yara satkaja kare

53|32|yara birata thake gurutara papa o aslila kaja theke, chotakhata aparadha byatita [1]. Niscaya apanara rabera ksama aparisima; tini tomadera samparke samyaka abagata---yakhana tini tomaderake srsti karechilena mati hate ebam yakhana tomara matrgarbhe bhrunarupe chile. Ata'eba, tomara atmaprasansa karo na, tini'i samyaka janena tara samparke ye taka'oya abalambana kareche [2].
53|33|Apani ki dekhechena se byaktike ye mukha phiriye neya
53|34|ebam dana kare saman'ya'i, pare bandha kare deya [1]
53|35|tara kache ki gayebera jnana ache ye, se pratyaksa kare
53|36|naki take janano hayani ya ache musara sahiphaya
53|37|ebam ibarahimera sahiphaya [1], yini purna karechilena (tara angikara) [2]
53|38|ta e'i ye [1], kono bojha bahanakari an'yera bojha bahana karabe na
53|39|ara e'i ye, manusa ta'i paya ya se cesta kare [1]
53|40|ara e'i ye, tara pracestara phala sighra'i dekha yabe
53|41|tarapara take deya habe purna pratidana
53|42|ara e'i ye, sabara sesa gantabya to apanara rabera kache [1]
53|43|ara e'i ye, tini'i hasana ebam tini'i kamdana [1]
53|44|ara e'i ye, tini'i marena ebam tini'i bamcana
53|45|ara e'i ye, tini'i srsti karena yugala---purusa o nari
53|46|sukrabindu hate, yakhana ta sthalita haya
53|47|ara e'i ye, punarut'thana ghatanora dayitba tamra'i [1]
53|48|ara e'i ye, tini'i abhabamukta karena ebam sampada dana karena [1]
53|49|ara e'i ye, tini si’ra naksatrera raba [1].
53|50|Ara e'i ye, tini'i pracina ‘ada sampradayake dhbansa karechilena
53|51|Ebam samuda sampradayake'o [1]; atahpara ka'uke'o tini baki rakhenani
53|52|ara edera age nuhera sampradayake'o, niscaya tara chila atyanta yalima o carama abadhya.
53|53|Ara tini ultano abasabhumike niksepa karechilena [1].
53|54|Atahpara setake acchanna karala ya acchanna karara [1]
53|55|sutaram (he manusa!) Tumi tomara rabera kon‌ anugraha samparke sandeha posana karabe [1]
53|56|e nabi'o [1] atitera satarkakaridera mata'i eka satarkakari.
53|57|Kiyamata asanna [1]
53|58|allaha chara ke'u'i eta prakasa karate saksama naya.
53|59|Tomara ki e kathaya bismaya bodha karacha
53|60|ara hasi-thatta karacha! Ebam kamdacho na [1]
53|61|ara tomara udasina [1]
53|62|ata'eba allahake sajada kara ebam tamra ‘ibadata kara [1].
54|1|Kiyamata kachakachi hayeche [1], ara camda bidirna hayeche [2]
54|2|ara tara kono nidarsana dekhale mukha phiriye neya ebam bale, ‘eta to ciracarita jadu [1].’
54|3|Ara tara mithyaropa kare ebam nija kheyala –khusira anusarana kare, athaca pratiti bisaya'i sesa lakse paumchabe [1].
54|4|Ara tadera kache eseche sambadasamuha, yate ache kathora nisedhajna
54|5|eta paripurna hikamata, kintu bhitipradarsana tadera kono kaje lageni.
54|6|Ata'eba, apani tadera upeksa karuna. (Smarana karuna) yedina ah‌banakari ah‌bana karabe eka bhayabaha parinamera dike
54|7|apamane abanamita netre [1] sedina tara kabara hate bera habe, mane habe yena tara biksipta pangapala
54|8|tara ahbanakarira dike chute asabe bhita-bihbala haye [1]. Kaphirara balabe, ‘bara'i kathina e dina.’
54|9|Edera age nuhera sampradaya'o mithyaropa karechila--- sutaram tara amadera bandara prati mithyaropa karechila ara balechila, ’pagala’, ara take bhiti pradarsana kara hayechila [1].
54|10|Takhana tini tamra rabake ahabana kare balechilena, ‘niscaya ami asahaya, ata'eba apani pratibidhana karuna.’
54|11|Phale amara unmukta kare dilama akasera dbarasamuha prabala barsanasila baridharara madhyame
54|12|ebam mati theke utsarita karalama jharnasamuha; phale samasta pani milita hala eka parikalpana anusare [1]
54|13|ara nuhake amara arohana karalama katha o perega nirmita eka nauyane [1]
54|14|ya calata amadera cokhera samane; eta puraskara tamra jan'ya, yara sathe kuphari kara hayechila.
54|15|Ara abasya'i amara etake rekhe diyechi eka nidarsanarupe [1]; ata'eba upadesa grahanakari ke'u ache ki
54|16|sutaram ki kathora chila amara sasti o bhitipradarsana
54|17|ara abasya'i amara kura'anake sahaja kare diyechi upadesa grahanera jan'ya [1], eta'eba upadesa grahanakari ke'u ache ki
54|18|‘ada sampradaya mithyaropa karechila, phale kirupa chila amara sasti o satarkabani
54|19|niscaya amara tadera upara pathiyechilama eka pracanda sitala jharoha'oya nirabacchinna amangala dine
54|20|ta manusake utkhata karechila yena tara utpatita khejura gachera kanda.
54|21|Ata'eba ki kathora chila amara sasti o bhitipradarsana
54|22|ara abasya'i amara kura'anake sahaja kare diyechi upadesa grahanera jan'ya; ata'eba upadesa grahanakari ke'u ache ki
54|23|samuda sampradaya satarkakaridera prati mithyaropa karechila
54|24|atahpara tara balechila, ‘amara ki amadera'i eka byaktira anusarana karaba? Tabe to amara pathabhrastataya ebam unmattataya patita haba.
54|25|‘Amadera madhye ki tara'i prati yikara [1] pathano hayeche? Na, se to ekajana mithyabadi, dambhika [2].’
54|26|Agami kala ora abasya'i janabe, ke mithyabadi, dambhika.
54|27|Niscaya amara tadera pariksara jan'ya ustri pathiyechi, ata'eba apani tadera acarana laksya karuna ebam dhairyasila hona.
54|28|Ara taderake janiye dina ye, tadera madhye pani bantana nirdharita ebam panira ansera jan'ya pratyeke upasthita habe palakrame.
54|29|Atahpara tara tadera sangike dakala, phale se setake (ustri) dhare hatya karala.
54|30|Ata'eba kirupa kathora chila amara sasti o bhitipradarsana
54|31|niscaya amara tadera upara pathiyechilama eka birata a'oyaja; phale tara haye gela khoyara prastutakarira bikhandita sulka kharera n'yaya [1].
54|32|Ara abasya'i amara kura'anake sahaja kare diyechi upadesa grahanera jan'ya; ata'eba upadesa grahanakari ke'u ache ki
54|33|luta sampradaya mithyaropa karechila satarkakaridera prati
54|34|niscaya amara tadera upara pathiyechilama pathara bahanakari pracanda jhatika, kintu luta paribarera upara naya; taderake amara ud'dhara karechilama ratera sesanse
54|35|amadera paksa theke anugrahasbarupa; ye krtajnata prakasa kare, amara ebhabe'i take puraskrta kare thaki.
54|36|Ara abasya'i luta taderake satarka karechila amadera kathora pakara'o samparke; kintu tara satarkabani sambandhe bitanda [1] suru karala.

54|37|Ara abasya'i tara lutera kacha theke tara mehamanaderake asaduddesye dabi karala [1], takhana amara tadera drsti sakti lopa kare dilama ebam balalama, ‘asbadana kara amara sasti ebam bhitira parinama.
54|38|Ara abasya'i pratyuse tadera upara biramahina sasti aghata karechila.
54|39|Sutaram ‘asbadana kara amara sasti ebam bhitipradarsanera parinama.’
54|40|Ara abasya'i amara kura'anake sahaja kare diyechi upadesa grahanera jan'ya; ata'eba upadesa grahanakari ke'u ache ki
54|41|ara abasya'i phira’a'una sampradayera kache esechila satarkakari
54|42|tara amadera saba nidarsane mithyaropa karala, sutaram amara mahaparakramasali o sarbasaktimanarupe taderake pakara'o karalama.
54|43|Tomadera madhyakara kaphirara ki tadera ceye bhala? Na ki tomadera abyahatira kono sanada rayeche purbabati kitabe
54|44|naki tara bale, ‘amara eka sanghabad'dha aparajeya dala? ’
54|45|E dala to sighra'i parajita habe ebam pitha dekhiye palabe [1]
54|46|baram kiyamata tadera sastira nirdharita samaya. Ara kiyamata habe kathinatara o tiktakara [1]
54|47|Niscaya aparadhira bibhranti o sastite rayeche [1].
54|48|Yedina taderake upura kare tene niye ya'oya habe jahannamera dike; sedina bala habe, ‘jahannamera yantrana asbadana kara.’
54|49|Niscaya amara pratyeka kichu srsti karechi nirdharita parimape [1]
54|50|ara amadera adesa to kebala ekati katha, cokhera palakera mata [1].
54|51|Ara abasya'i amara dhbansa karechi tomadera mata dalaguloke. Ata'eba, upadesa grahanakari ke'u ache ki
54|52|ara tara ya kareche sabakichu'i ache ‘amalanamaya’
54|53|ara chota bara saba kichu'i likhita ache [1].
54|54|Niscaya muttakira thakabe baga-bagica o jharnadharara madhye
54|55|yathayogya asane, sarbasaktimana maha'adhipati (allah‌)ra sannidhye.
55|1|Ara-rahamana [1]
55|2|tini'i siksa diyechena kura'ana [1]
55|3|tini'i srsti karechena manusa [1]
55|4|tini'i take sikhiyechena bhasa [1]
55|5|surya o camda abartana kare nirdharita hisebe [1]
55|6|ara trnalata o brksadi sajada karache [1]
55|7|ara asamana, tini take karechena samunnata ebam sthapana karechena damripalla
55|8|yate tomara simalajana na kara damripallaya.
55|9|Ara tomara ojanera n'yayya mana pratisthita kara ebam ojane kama di'o na.
55|10|Ara yamina, tini ta sthapana karechena srsta jibera jan'ya
